name: Mobile Complete
overview:
DeviceAnywhere is the Ultimate Mobile Testing Platform, serving over 2000 organizations worldwide. The award winning solutions deliver unparalleled benefits to the customers around the globe in the shape of reduced operational costs, faster time-to-market, higher quality products, and increased consumer satisfaction â€“ all of which lead to increased mobile revenue and profits.

DeviceAnywhereâ€™s success has won the company numerous industry accolades including the prestigious Fierce 15, Frost & Sullivanâ€™s Mobility award and the GSMA award twice. DeviceAnywhereâ€™s customers span a wide breadth of market segments ranging from media and entertainment, mobile operators and handset manufacturers to finance and banking, healthcare, retail, supply chain, and travel â€“ all companies with the common goal of taking their business into the mobile channel.

DeviceAnywhere offers its solutions in a variety of formats to suit the business needs of a wide diversity of customers:

With the worldâ€™s largest phone bank, DeviceAnywhereâ€™s flagship product, DeviceAnywhere Test Centerâ„¢ provides instant remote access to more than 2000 real devices across live global networks in 7 countries. This unique Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) solution is available from anywhere in the world over the Internet and allows you to perform testing, test automation and application certification over a global network of real mobile handsets accessible at your fingertips through the convenience of your PC. DeviceAnywhere Stand-alone configurations are ideal if you prefer to access a hosted suite of mobile devices in your own private setting behind your firewall or at unique locations not currently supported by DeviceAnywhere. Companies tasked with building and managing internal applications such as IT, CRM or ERP on Smartphones can leverage DeviceAnywhere as a software only solution to test even the most complex enterprise mobility applications. Other products from DeviceAnywhere provide solutions for mobile application testing, test automation, certification, QoS monitoring, and QA, as well as customer care and online support.

funding_rounds.source_description: Mobile Complete, a handset testing service, raises around $10M
